channel.title: How do i make myself owner
channel.description:
1.i download a sever and ran it and it worked. how do i make me owner and show the gold crown?
2. and my second question, how can i change the name of server into the name i want?

item.title: How do i make myself owner
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

If those people above me didn’t help, maybe this will : [i]Go into you’re source file. Be it Testscape, Pimpscape, whatever. Then go into the Character file, double-click the person you wan’t to make an administrator/moderator and change the player rights to one of the following :

1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner
[/i]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner

item.title: How do i make myself owner
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

client.java, search the name and change it to what you want, to make your self owner, go into characters folder, click on your name, right click and click edit, change the rights to 3, 3 is owner, 2 is admin, 1 is mod.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner

item.title: How do i make myself owner
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go on char files and look at rights and give urself 4 if that dont work create another or edit them to 3
